files.patch:
@@ -30,1 +30,1 @@
-# wget and cmake are required to build tidy.
+# wget, cmake and gcc are required to build tidy.
@@ -79,1 +79,1 @@
-rm -rf $SRC_DIR
+rm -rf "$SRC_DIR"
@@ -84,1 +84,1 @@
-tar -czvf "$PACKAGED_FILE" -C $INSTALL_PREFIX.. tidy
+tar -czvf "$PACKAGED_FILE" -C "$INSTALL_PREFIX.." tidy
@@ -86,1 +86,1 @@
-echo "Created $INSTALL_PREFIX/../$PACKAGED_FILE"
+echo "Created $INSTALL_PREFIX..$PACKAGED_FILE"
